title: Finance/Statistics Consultant
job_overview:
We are seeking a professional to join our team as a Finance Associate.

This hybrid role combines dynamic portfolio analysis and management with personalized client support, utilizing our proprietary internal system focused on arbitrage strategies. Through individual sessions, you will provide follow-up and strategic guidance to users, ensuring proper capital allocation, maximizing returns, and meeting specific objectives.

More information about the company and the system will be shared during the initial call.

Required Profile
English (spoken and written) â€“ most interactions will be in English
Logical thinking and affinity for numbers
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
Intermediate or advanced proficiency in spreadsheets (Excel or Google Sheets)
Excellent communication skills to explain complex concepts clearly
Responsible, proactive, and results-oriented
